history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01887
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ABOLISHING IRRIGATION SERVICE FEES AND OTHER RELATED FEES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 3601, PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 552 AND PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1702
SHORT TITLE : Free Irrigation Services For Farmers Act
ABSTRACT : States that Irrigations Service Fees (ISF) and all other similar or related fees shall be free of charge to all farmer beneficiaries, upon enactment of this Acts.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESTRELLA, CONRADO III M., ORTEGA, VINI NOLA A.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-26
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Acosta (025 2016-09-21)2. Alvarez (F.) (025 2016-09-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-11-22
          -A Technical Working Group was created to further study the NIA bills with Rep. NOEL VILLANUEVA as the Chairman, and co-chaired by Reps. Conrado Estrella and Cecilia Leonila Chavez.
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      3. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 37, 189, 294, 526, 558, 1053, 1197, 1887, 1943, 2133, 2150, 2247, 2251, 2812, 2857, 2880, 2902, 3013, 3119, 3151, 3302, 3505, 3589, 3595, 3853, 4056, 4162, 4170 and 4358 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB05670
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2016-08-03
